attributes.action: Make most of the restaurants and fast food shops serve halal meat and/or kosher
attributes.background: Many people in the UK are muslims and is increasing. However, many restaurants and fast food shops such as McDonald's are not halal or kosher which makes it hard for muslims or Jews to treat themselves with outside food. Making meat hall will attract more customers and therefore more profit

rejection.details: This is a choice for restaurants and fast food shops, not the Government or Parliament.
